clauses.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: The Site and our mobile application uses Cloudflare, a third-party content delivery network, for performance and security.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: This service does not track you
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: TourOfCalifornia.org does not use any first-party cookies.

clauses.title: No personal data is collected by the service
clauses.description: The service does not require users to reveal personal information for most of its website. However, it may still collect anonymous logs.
clauses.clause_text: The Site and our mobile application do not collect any data.

case.text: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

clauses.title: You can choose not to provide location information
clauses.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.
clauses.clause_text: You can manage the permissions of the app to allow or refuse access to location information

case.text: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: Under no circumstance shall we have any liability to you for any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of the use of the Site and our mobile application or reliance upon any information provided on the Site and our mobile application.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
clauses.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.
clauses.clause_text:
The Site and our mobile application contain links to other websites or content belonging to or originating from third parties.
Such external links can be identified by a dashed underline and are not checked, investigated, or monitored for accuracy, adequacy, availability, completeness, reliability, or validity by us.
We do not endorse, guarantee, warrant, or assume responsibility for the accuracy, adequacy, availability, completeness, reliability, or validity of any information offered by third-party websites linked through the Site.

case.text: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text: "we make no representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, adequacy, availability, completeness, reliability, or validity of any information on the Site and our mobile application."

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: "we make no representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, adequacy, availability, completeness, reliability, or validity of any information on the Site and our mobile application."

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: Our mobile application uses Google Maps API, which is cookieless.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service
